meanings.sent1: After his demob, he returned home to his family.
meanings.sent2: The demob of the soldiers was a joyous occasion.
meanings.sent3: The demob of the troops brought smiles to their faces.
meanings.sent4: The demob felt like a weight lifted off their shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The demob marked the end of their military duty.

meanings.sent1: They will demob the soldiers after their tour of duty.
meanings.sent2: The commander decided to demob the troops due to peace negotiations.
meanings.sent3: The demob process was swift and efficient.
meanings.sent5: Soldiers eagerly awaited their demob papers.

meanings.definition: The process of releasing someone from military service.
meanings.sent1: The demob was delayed due to administrative issues.
meanings.sent2: During the demob, each soldier received their discharge papers.
meanings.sent5: The demob signaled the end of their military commitment.
